text: haey banda anak del yeung ban bratan aoy puokke nouv kompir ( ta vr t ainh chi l) daoy puokke rikreay nung avei delke ban banhchouh aoy anak . haey knongchamnaom krom teangnoh mean anak del bdeseth ampi vea( kompir kuor an) . chaur anak pol tha pitabrakd nasa khnhom trauv ban ke nhchea aoy korp sakkar champoh a l laoh haey min aoy khnhom thveu shi rik champoh trong laey . khnhom ampeavneav( mnoussa lok) tow champoh trong te muoy kt haey kanleng vilotralb robsakhnhom ka tow champoh trong der
